title: Dao Xiang (Hương Lúa)
lyrics: Dui zhe ge shi jie ru guo ni you tai duo de bao yu Die dao le jiu bu gan qi xu wang qian zou Wei shen me ren yao zhe yang de sui ruo, duo luo Qing ni da kai dian shi kan kan Duo shao ren wei sheng ming zai nu li yong gan de zou xia qu Wo men shi bu shi gai zhi zu Zhen xi yi qie jiu suan mei you yong you Hai ji de ni shuo jia shi wei yi de cheng bao shui zhe dao xiang he liu qi xu qi peng pao Wei wei xiao xiao shi hou de meng wo zhi dao Bu yao ku rang ying huo cong dai zhe ni tao pao, xiang jian de ge yao yong yuan de yi kao Hui jia ba hui dao zui chu de mei hao Bu yao zhe me rong yi jiu xiang fang qi jiu xiang wo shuo de zui bu dao de meng xiang huan ge meng bu jiu de le Wei zi ji de ren sheng xian dian shang se xian ba ai tu shang xi huan de yan se Xiao yi ge ba gong cheng ming jiu bu shi mu di Rang zi ji kuai le kuai le zui cai jiao zuo yi yi Tong nian de zhi fei ji xian zai shi yu fei hui wo shou li Suo wei de na kuai le ji jiao zai tian li zui jing wa zui dao lei le Tou di shui guo bei mi feng gei ding dao pa le shui zai tou xiao ne WO kao zhe dao xiang ren zhui zhe feng chang zhe ge shui zhao le Oh Oh niu hou qi ta zai cong niao zhong geng jing chui Oh Oh yang guang sai zai lu shang jiu bu pa xin xui Zhen xi yi qie jiu sian mei you yong you Hai ji de ni shuo jia shi wei yi de cheng bao shui zhe dao xiang he liu qi xu qi peng pao Wei wei xiao xiao shi hou de meng wo zhi dao Bu yao ku rang ying huo cong dai zhe ni tao pao, xiang jian de ge yao yong yuan de yi kao Hui jia ba hui dao zui chu de mei hao
